item.title: Principles 2
item.description: 02/25/2023 62% Received the paperback Chinese version yesterday. I find it necessary to have a hard copy at hand to refer to from time to time, censored or not. I noticed myself tending to skip the charts in the book. Maybe it’s because even though I know in general what each chart is about, I failed to grasp the specifics, which makes it hard for me to fully understand the chart.

item.title: Writing Practice I
item.description: Task 1 Prompt The graph below shows the proportion of four different materials that were recycled from 1982 to 2010 in a particular country. Summarize the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant. Write at least 150 words. Answer Throughout the decades, recycling rates for all the listed materials have been increasing in this country. To the citizens, this should be a good thing. However, there are some additional points worth noting.
